Uses of Class
org.openurc.uch.UCHException

  • Packages that use UCHException 
    Package Description
    edu.wisc.trace.uch
    Provides Classes which are used to startup and bind the UCH to the core SDK, and provide interface to the clients.
    org.openurc.uch
    Provides Interfaces which are used to communicate among different modules like UCH, TDM, TA and UIPM.

    • Uses of UCHException in org.openurc.uch

      Methods in org.openurc.uch that throw UCHException 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean IUIPMListener.addCompatibleUI(String targetId, String socketName, String protocolShortName, List<String> uris, Map<String,List<String>> protocolInfo, List<Map<String,List<String>>> icons, List<Map<String,IProfile>> contexts)
      Tell the UCH to add a user interface item (advertised by the UIPM) to its UIList which is exposed to controllers on request.
      void ITAListener.addUriServiceContexts(ITA ta, String uri, List<Map<String,IProfile>> contexts)
      Called when the TA wants to add one or more contexts to a URI service.
      void ITDMListener.addUriServiceContexts(ITDM tdm, String uri, List<Map<String,IProfile>> contexts)
      Called when the TDM wants to add one or more contexts to a URI service.
      void IUIPMListener.addUriServiceContexts(IUIPM uipm, String uri, List<Map<String,IProfile>> contexts)
      Called when the UIPM wants to add one or more contexts to a URI service.
      String ITDMListener.getDocument(String uri, String postData, Map<String,IProfile> context)
      Get specified document through HTTP GET or POST.
      String IUIPMListener.getDocument(String uri, String postData, Map<String,IProfile> context)
      Get specified document through HTTP GET or POST.
      String ITAListener.getDocument(String uri, String postData, Map<String,IProfile> context)
      Get specified document through HTTP GET or POST.
      void IUIPMListener.removeCompatibleUIs(List<String> uris)
      Tells the UCH to remove user interface URIs from the UIList that were previously added by addCompatibleUI().
      void ITAListener.removeUriServiceContexts(ITA ta, String uri, List<Map<String,IProfile>> contexts)
      Called when the TA wants to remove one or more contexts to a URI service.
      void ITDMListener.removeUriServiceContexts(ITDM tdm, String uri, List<Map<String,IProfile>> contexts)
      Called when the TDM wants to close one or more contexts to a URI service.
      void IUIPMListener.removeUriServiceContexts(IUIPM uipm, String uri, List<Map<String,IProfile>> contexts)
      Called when the UIPM wants to close one or more contexts to a URI service.
      String ITAListener.startUriService(ITA ta, String scheme, int port, boolean portIsFlexible, String basePath, boolean basePathIsFlexible, List<Map<String,IProfile>> contexts)
      The ITA requests the UCH to start servicing a URI which is made up of a given scheme, port, and base path.
      String ITDMListener.startUriService(ITDM tdm, String scheme, int port, boolean portIsFlexible, String basePath, boolean basePathIsFlexible, List<Map<String,IProfile>> contexts)
      The ITDM requests the UCH to start servicing a URI which is made up of a given scheme, port, and base path.
      String IUIPMListener.startUriService(IUIPM uipm, String scheme, int port, boolean portIsFlexible, String basePath, boolean basePathIsFlexible, List<Map<String,IProfile>> contexts)
      The UIPM requests the UCH to start servicing a URI which is made up of a given scheme, port, and base path.
      void ITAListener.stopUriService(ITA ta, String uri)
      The ITA requests the UCH to stop servicing a URI that was requested to be serviced in a previous call to startUriService().
      void ITDMListener.stopUriService(ITDM tdm, String uri)
      The ITDM requests the UCH to stop servicing a URI that was requested to be serviced in a previous call to startUriService().
      void IUIPMListener.stopUriService(IUIPM uipm, String uri)
      The UIPM requests the UCH to stop servicing a URI that was requested to be serviced in a previous call to startUriService().
